title: pes cse or bits hyd mech

comments.body: Well i dont recommend lower branches in bits as it is not really worth it due to the fees ig will still be 35 lakhs and if you have no plans to leave india you prolly wont get a good job here.
i do have plans of leaving but not immediately after graduation. probably work for 1 or 2 years

Mate finding work in india for mech is gonna really be hard. I would recommend you ask any senior who has done mech about business and job opportunities here as you might have to pay for you studies abroad.
yeah that was my primary concern
If I were you, I will go for pes cs
